sp_rel_widget_clone.payload: standardc.nav { li { padding: 10px 7px; > span { > a { display: inline; } > i { padding-left: 15px; } } } } .a-disabled { cursor: default; color: $sp-disabled-breadcrumb; }sp_instancefalsebreadcrumbsfalsebreadcrumbsfalse

sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_436a07f907db1810c11df2218c1ed05c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of breadcrumbs">cb6a07f907db1810c11df2218c1ed059</child><cloned>2020-09-17 21:47:26</cloned><last_validated>2020-09-17 21:47:26</last_validated><parent display_value="breadcrumbs">0fb269305b3212000d7ec7ad31f91ae2</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, $rootScope, spUtil) {
	var c = this;
	c.expanded = !spUtil.isMobile();
	c.expand = function() {
		c.expanded = true;
	};

	var deregister = $rootScope.$on("sp.update.breadcrumbs", function(e, list) {
		c.breadcrumbs = list;
	});

	$scope.$on('$destroy', function(){
		deregister();
	});

}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.nav {
  li {
    padding: 10px 7px;

    &gt; span {
      &gt; a {
          display: inline;
      }

      &gt; i {
          padding-left: 15px;
      }
    }
  }
}

.a-disabled {
  cursor: default;
  color: $sp-disabled-breadcrumb;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>breadcrumbs</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>breadcrumbs</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script/><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-12 21:39:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>0fb269305b3212000d7ec7ad31f91ae2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>breadcrumbs</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">e23c655c2c1700100c1dbc48b5c9f587</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_0fb269305b3212000d7ec7ad31f91ae2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-15 05:41:38</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div aria-label="${Page breadcrumbs}" role="navigation">
<ul class="nav nav-pills nav-sm">
  <li>
    <span><a ng-href="?id={{portal.homepage_dv}}">${Home}</a>
      <i aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-chevron-right"></i></span>
  </li>
  <li ng-if="!c.expanded &amp;&amp; c.breadcrumbs &amp;&amp; c.breadcrumbs.length > 2">
    <span><a ng-click="c.expand()"><i class="fa fa-ellipsis-h" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>
      <i aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-chevron-right"></i></span>
  </li>
  <li ng-if="!c.breadcrumbs"><span><a style="display: inline;" class="a-disabled" aria-current="page" href>{{page.title}}</a></span></li>
  <li ng-if="c.expanded || ((c.breadcrumbs.length > 2  &amp;&amp; $index > c.breadcrumbs.length-3) || (c.breadcrumbs.length <= 2))" ng-repeat="item in c.breadcrumbs track by $index" >
    <span><a ng-if="!$last" ng-href="{{item.url}}">{{item.label}}</a>
      <a class="a-disabled" ng-if="$last" aria-current="page" href>{{item.label}}</a>
      <i aria-hidden="true" ng-if="!$last" class="fa fa-chevron-right"></i></span>
  </li>
</ul>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-17 21:47:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>436a07f907db1810c11df2218c1ed05c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cb6a07f907db1810c11df2218c1ed059</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Domino App" source="x_513186_domino_ap">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Domino App">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_436a07f907db1810c11df2218c1ed05c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-17 21:47:26</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
